step1.title: Step 1: Phone Number ID
step1.description: Your Phone Number ID is found in the Meta Business Suite
instructions: Click on 'WhatsApp Manager' in the left sidebar
Your Phone Number ID appears next to your phone number

step2.title: Step 2: Business Account ID
step2.description: Your Business Account ID identifies your WhatsApp Business Account
instructions: In Meta Business Suite, go to 'Business Settings'
Click on 'WhatsApp Accounts' in the left sidebar
Your Business Account ID appears under your account name

step3.title: Step 3: Access Token
step3.description: Generate a permanent access token for API authentication
step3.securityWarning: Keep your access token secure. Never share it publicly or commit it to version control.
instructions: Go to Meta Business Suite â†’ System Users
Create a new system user or select an existing one
Click 'Generate Token' and copy it immediately
step3.webhookTokenHelper: A custom token to verify webhook requests. Leave empty to auto-generate.

step1.title: Step 1: Twilio Account Credentials
step1.description: Enter your Twilio Account SID and Auth Token from the Twilio Console
instructions: Log in to your Twilio Console at console.twilio.com
Your Account SID and Auth Token are shown on the dashboard
Click the eye icon to reveal your Auth Token
